author: Vertyco
description: Guess pictures before anyone else as sections of it are slowly revealed.
end_user_data_statement:
This cog only stores user IDs for its leaderboard.

This cog can cause rate limiting on larger bots due to it deleting and re-sending updated images frequently.

DOCUMENTATION: https://github.com/vertyco/vrt-cogs/blob/main/pixl/README.md
